alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 3:21AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches from 7000 to 7500 with higher amounts of 6 to 12 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph on Friday. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Alpine, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver.Winds gusting as high as 30 mph on Friday. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact commutes. Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 6 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Pinetop-Lkside 1 to 3 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
